## BlockSvg.getNextBlock() method

Return the next statement block directly connected to this block.  The next statement block or null.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNextBlock(): BlockSvg | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) \| null
